name: HO HO HORNY HOT CHOCOLATE
description:
Hot chocolate is a drink that has came to be an almost tradition during the Christmas season.  Families have sat down to watch movies or television with a warm mug of hot chocolate.  It is a drink full of chocolatey goodness that warms up every inch of your body!  

When creating our HO HO HORNY HOT CHOCOLATE, we made sure that its flavour would surpass any hot chocolate you have ever had before.  With the slightest hint of cinnamon, this will be the most body warming, awesome tasting, sexually stimulating hot chocolate you have ever tasted!

Q: Is it actually sexually stimulating? 

A: YES, HO HO HORNY tastes so good and makes you feel so warm inside that you will just want to rip off your clothes and jump on your partner.
